nodes.bodyText: How about we init an arrow with a custom time, so for the arrows of our trainees we can make this 100, and all other stays 10?
hm dont think we need that, those 5 sec should be still fine for all needs
Oh the motivation is more to have it remove them quicker if we don't need them 5s. (Even less lag)
ye doesnt make a difference really, both despawn rather quick
